pullRequest.title: [#3593] Add translation strings for personal data tooltip
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adding and fixing other missing/broken translation strings

The solution

Reviewer Checklist

 Added a test plan to the issue
 Updated the copyright header (when relevant)
 Formatted the code
 Added a documentation (if relevant)
 Added some unit tests (if relevant)

commit.message:
[#3593] Add translation strings for personal data tooltip

* Adding and fixing other missing/broken translation strings
